ingredientStatement.text: Ingredients: Water, High Fructose Corn Syrup, Reconstituted Vegetable Juice (Water And Concentrated Juice Of (Sweet Potatoes), Reconstituted Fruit Juice Blend (Water And Concentrated Juices Of (Lemons, Strawberries), Citric Acid, Flavoring (Natural Flavors, Strawberry Juice Concentrate, Watermelon Juice Concentrate, Ascorbic Acid), Red 40, Vitamin C (Ascorbic Acid), Gum Arabic, Calcium Disodium Edta (To Promote Flavor And Color Retention), Ester Gum, Sucralose, Sodium Citrate.

productText.text: Delicious fruit flavors the whole family can enjoy
productText.textHTML: Delicious fruit flavors the whole family can enjoy

productText.text: Contains a 5% blend of 3 juices from concentrate, with other natural flavors
productText.textHTML: Contains a 5% blend of 3 juices from concentrate, with other natural flavors

productText.text: V8 Splash® Strawberry Lemonade is the perfect thirst-quencher for your whole family. So fruity and delicious, it will juice up their day.
productText.textHTML: V8 Splash® Strawberry Lemonade is the perfect thirst-quencher for your whole family. So fruity and delicious, it will juice up their day.

productText.text: V8 Splash® Strawberry Lemonade is the perfect thirst-quencher for your whole family. So fruity and delicious, it will juice up their day. What gives Splashdrinks their tastiness? The combination of natural fruit flavors and 5% juice, whirled together for a deliciously refreshing taste.
productText.textHTML: V8 Splash® Strawberry Lemonade is the perfect thirst-quencher for your whole family. So fruity and delicious, it will juice up their day. What gives Splashdrinks their tastiness? The combination of natural fruit flavors and 5% juice, whirled together for a deliciously refreshing taste.

productText.text: Here’s a drink that will have everyone in your family saying yum. Deliciously refreshing, V8 Splash® comes in a variety of flavors, from Berry Blend to Mango Peach. Each member of your family is sure to find a personal fave. Made with natural fruit flavors and a 5% blend of juice, you’ll love the burst of flavor in every sip. Fun at snack time, dinnertime, and all those times in between.
productText.textHTML: Here’s a drink that will have everyone in your family saying yum. Deliciously refreshing, V8 Splash® comes in a variety of flavors, from Berry Blend to Mango Peach. Each member of your family is sure to find a personal fave. Made with natural fruit flavors and a 5% blend of juice, you’ll love the burst of flavor in every sip. Fun at snack time, dinnertime, and all those times in between.

warningStatement.text: DO NOT PURCHASE UNLESS CAP AND NECKBAND ARE INTACT.
